A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't mind disposing of elements of the past movies\, don't mind a few plot holes. But this film\, good grief. It's riddled with plot holes that took me out the movie. It doesn't give any pay off in terms of explanations or sense of resolution and I found myself gazing at my watch and hoping it would end.\n\nI've still got no idea about who the first order are\, how they came to be\, have no idea about many of the main characters. And...I could go on forever. Frankly I have no idea how they'll be able to do the next film. What's left? What a terrible shame.
